description:
“Things are going to be way crazier; it's an escalation," comics creator Robert Kirkman said of what to expect in the fourth season, which will premiere Sunday, Oct. 13 at 9 p.m., followed by the season premiere of The Talking Dead. The second half of the season will return in February.“事情变得更疯狂了，并且在逐步升级。”主创罗伯特·柯克曼透露了关于《行尸走肉》第四季的情况进展。《行尸走肉》第四季将于美国时间10月13日周日晚九点首映，在《闲话僵尸》后播出。第四季第二部分将在明年2月份回归。

This season, Gimple said fans shouldn't get too comfortable with the nature of the threat of the Governor -- or even walkers. "They might get a little comfortable, but then things might get a little dangerous," he said of threats on the series that have included the evolution of walkers.关于本季，金浦勒告诉粉丝们不要轻视了总督、甚至是僵尸们的威胁。“他们刚过了会儿舒坦日子，但是紧接着事情就会变得有些危险。”他说本季的威胁还包括了僵尸的演变进化。

The first footage of season four revealed that the walkers are quickly closing in on the prison, which is now employing tricks Rick picked up on from Morgan (Lennie James). Additionally, someone attacks inside the prison -- with Rick and Tyreese (Chad L. Coleman) looking to find out just who's behind it. Also, comic character Bob Stokey seeks to lend a hand and earn his keep among the group. 在第四季的首个预告片中我们可以看到僵尸们在迅速接近监狱，还好瑞克从摩根那里拿到了很多装备。此外，有人攻击了监狱里的人——瑞克和泰尔西要找出是谁做的。而且，漫画中的人物鲍勃·斯托克也在试图帮忙并融入团队。

Star Andrew Lincoln previewed that Rick will be in a completely different place when the zombie drama returns and that the decision to return to the dilapidated prison will be explained. 安德鲁·林肯（瑞克的扮演者）也告诉了我们当第四季回归后，瑞克会处在一个完全不同的立场，他还会解释为什么要回到那个破旧的监狱。
